value:
$nMPID_比翼トール|Why are mortals drawn to a place
dominated by such heat? Is it...a way
for them to challenge themselves?

$nMPID_ロキ味方|I had suits with even scanter material,
but...Thórr would only glare at me
until I relented and put them away.

$nMPID_比翼トール|No matter where you find yourself,
it is possible to train. If you desire
true strength, battle the tide.

$nMPID_ロキ味方|There's no need to be shy in a place
like this. Half the fun is enjoying all
the delightful sights.

$nMPID_比翼トール|Loki lured me here with promises
of battle and glory. In other words...
this was another of her schemes.

$nMPID_ロキ味方|I am Loki, and this is Thórr. We are
indulging in all the beach offers, at
behest of $Nf.

$nMPID_ロキ味方|Thórr seems to finally be enjoying
herself... Good. One ought to enjoy
these sunny beaches when one can.
$nMPID_ロキ味方|Hm. A bit distracted, are we?

$nMPID_比翼トール|I could not bear to face Alfaðör
in such a state as this...

$nMPID_ロキ味方|Thank you. We'll be able to have
even more fun on our little vacation
with this.

I am Thórr, and— Loki, what is the
meaning of this? What do you have
us wearing?

$nMPID_ロキ味方|Oh my, Thórr. Look at you, watching
the sunset... Such childlike wonder.$k$p$nMPID_比翼トール|Childlike? How could a being as
long-lived as I be anything like
a child?$k$p$nMPID_ロキ味方|What does the length of your life
have to do with it? It's the sparkle
in your eye that matters.$k$pTanning under the summer sun,
surrendering yourself to the surf,
staying on the beach until sunset...$k$pI think most mortals would identify
those things as youthful.$k$pI caught that sparkle in your eye,
Thórr—and it was just like that of
a child first seeing the ocean!$k$p$nMPID_比翼トール|...As usual, you make it difficult to
tell where the flattery ends and the
manipulation begins.$k$pI must admit, however, that your
games are not always wholly
without fun.
$nMPID_二人|Tropical attack!
$nMPID_二人|Onward. Yes, dear.
$nMPID_比翼トール|You are sunk.
$nMPID_ロキ味方|Captivated, are you?
I? This heat...
Do well, or else.
Don't forget to oil up!

"A nice breeze."
"And a spot of shade."

"See how they gaze!"
"Is something amiss?"

"Maintain your composure. It is merely a beach."
"Always the stick in the mud."
What a pickle.
I need no break!
We must enjoy ourselves!

$nMPID_ロキ味方|Oh, it's so hot. Hot enough to simply
ruin one's mood.

$nMPID_比翼トール|Cease your squirming. You are
attracting unwanted attention.

$nMPID_ロキ味方|Squirming? Me? Preposterous.
Besides, it's not just me they're
looking at, dear.
$nMPID_比翼トール|Explain.

$nMPID_ロキ味方|*sigh* I do wonder about you, Thórr.$k$pIt seems that no matter how long you
live, you just can't find the trick to
sharpening your wit.$k$pWhat I mean to say, dear, is that many
of the gazes are trained your way.

$nMPID_比翼トール|My way? It seems this scanty
garb is strange, then.

I had intended only to conform
to the social etiquette of these
mortals. But now...

$nMPID_ロキ味方|Oh, darling, no, no, you've got it all
wrong. Their interest is an indication
of just what a good job we've done.$k$pTheir eyes reflect nothing but
approbation!

$nMPID_比翼トール|Stop, please. I have no appetite for
your tricks.

$nMPID_ロキ味方|Fine, then. If you are feeling put out,
let me mend your mood. Please lie
down so I can apply some oil to you.$k$pIt has a lovely, calming scent.
$nMPID_比翼トール|By way of apology? Very well, then.

$nMPID_ロキ味方|You'll forget we have ever quarreled.
Just let me unfasten this...

$nMPID_比翼トール|You would remove what scraps
of clothing I do bear?

$nMPID_ロキ味方|Oh, dear, of course! This oil is for the
body. I must apply it to your flesh.
That's just how it's done!
$nMPID_比翼トール|Is that so? But... It seems to me that...

$nMPID_ロキ味方|Shh-shh-shh. Simply lie down. Then
no one will be able to catch even a
glimpse of you. Now, shall I?
$nMPID_比翼トール|You may begin.
